Package game

Class Game

java.lang.Object
game.Game
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameInterface
public class Game extends Object implements GameInterface
Main Game class which manages the state of the program.
Author:
Eduardo Correia, Alberto Serra, JosÃ© Carvalho

    • setState

      public void setState​(int newState)
      Description copied from interface: GameInterface
      Changes the state of the state machine.

      (1) Initial menu. (2) Load the game. (3) Exit. (4) Restart the game. (5) Cleans old game and goes to main menu.

      Specified by:
      setState in interface GameInterface
      Parameters:
      newState - value of the new state.
